NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
PROJECT IN UNDERSTANDING NEW MEDIA
r
NAEB headquarters
Address reply to:
MARSHALL McLUHAN
PROJECT DIRECTOR
MB 4 i960
96 Saint Joseph Street

?l?l?|M|%12|l|2|3|4|gjp
February 29th, i960.
Mr. Harold Hill,
NAEB,
14 Gregory Hall,
Urbana, Ill.,
U.S.A.
Dear Mr. Hill:
Would you please send copies of the items Prof.
McLuhan requires for American Income Tax purposes.
I believe you did send these to Prof. McLuhan, but
they apparently have been misplaced.
To expedite matters, you might, if you wish,
direct them to Mrs. H. M. McLuhan at 29 Wells Hill Ave..
Toronto 10, Ont.
Thank you very much.
-/RN (Mfss) Ruth Nusbaum.
